data.text: Isirayila to bara fe fanyi bɛɲin,
E bara mangɛe ti n ma yaamari mu naxan na,
Samarikae, wo wo xa ninge kuye wɔlɛ.
Yi kuye fatanxi wo tan Isirayila nan na.
Isirayilakae bara siga Asiriya bɔxi ma,
Hali e mixi naxee saraxi sie tagi e kantafe ma,
N bara n ma sɛriyɛe birin sɛbɛ, e xa na kolon,
E sɛrɛxɛe bama n bɛ, e na sube don,
Isirayila bara nɛɛmu Ala ma, naxan e daaxi.
